name: Aleph (Sukritact)
description:
In Aleph, you control the Phoenician Script; forefather of many of the world’s writing systems. Your goal is simple, between the years 1200 & 150 BCE, spread, grow and gain prestige, ensuring your script will be used through the ages. Against you are other scripts who wish to do the same. To do this, you are given influence over Merchants, Priests and Nobles, who you may station in cities you control for various effects.

***
